title: With Flutter 2.10, you can now create apps for Windows just as easily as Android and iOS
content:
For the last few years, the name of the game for Google’s Flutter SDK has been expansion: expanding the number of Flutter developers and expanding the platforms for which they can make apps. The latest update, Flutter 2.10, makes it just as easy to make apps for Windows as it is for Android and iOS.

more…

The post With Flutter 2.10, you can now create apps for Windows just as easily as Android and iOS appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The latest Flutter SDK update, version 2.10, makes it just as easy to make apps for Windows as it is for Android and iOS.
